description: Number of partitions of n into parts 6k+1 or 6k+3.
formula: a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(2*n)/3) * Gamma(1/6) / (4 * 2^(5/12) * sqrt(3) * Pi^(5/6) * n^(7/12)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(6k+1))*(1 - x^(6k+3))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015 *)
